thread.title: 032c Joins Forces with Milan’s Slam Jam to Drop Motocross-Inspired Gear
thread.title_full: 032c Joins Forces with Milan’s Slam Jam to Drop Motocross-Inspired Gear

author: Kam Dhillon
title: 032c Joins Forces with Milan’s Slam Jam to Drop Motocross-Inspired Gear
text:
Previous Next 
Berlin-based biannual fashion and culture tome 032c adds to its impressive merch offering with a special new line of Motocross-inspired gear. The new collection launches exclusively with Milan-based streetwear temple Slam Jam. From February 22 to February 26, Slam Jam Milano will premiere 032c ’s fiery, new motocross collection in an installation inspired by heat and volatility. Piotr Niepsuij / 032c 
It looks as though the extreme sports aesthetic has finally reached terminal trend velocity. We’re all about the coming insurrection of high performance-inspired gear emblazoned with sexy-aggressive iconography — it’s enough to induce an adrenaline rush without even touching a motorbike. We already foretold the hype of racing gear , and now you can get in on the motocross fetish too with some simply sick gear courtesy of 032c . 
The collection features the “Codeine Flame Jersey,” the “Freedom Longsleeve” in Black and White, the “Power T-shirt,” the “Energy Sweatpants,” the “Crew Shirt,” and a limited edition of the classic “Religious Services” sweatshirt in a purple colorway.
